name: Lost Perspective Game Jam Version
description:
Lost Perspective is a game made for the Nexus gamejam made by me Mat.exe

Lost perspective is a top down horror game ,with all assets made by me except the jump scare,it`s a short horror experience,very short made in a shorter amount of time than the limit because of some problems,i hope you will enjoy it.

How to play:

Up arrow to move up

Down arrow to move down

Left arrow to move left

Right arrow to move right

Press f to bring out the mirror(the only thing you can defend yourself with)

Please Report any bugs,even tho it won`t be updated, i want to see what bugs i have curently and try to solve them so in future won`t happen again.

Enjoy the game and good luck for everybody else.
